channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Car on blocks, 5th December
item.description:
Car on blocks outside 16 wordsworth road se20 clearly dangerous and has been like this for a number of days no bumper or visable number plate
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Wordsworth Road, Penge, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Waste blocking pavement again, 5th December
item.description:
The residents keep leaving waste, metal, bikes, and assorted rubbish scattered outside the property and across the pavement. It's a public health hazard and totally unacceptable.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Glenarm Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Garden waste bin left on pavement o/s 166-168 Northdown Road, 5th December
item.description:
A garden waste bin has been left on the pavement since September and it keeps falling over. It is dangerous as it could roll into the road. Please can this be removed with a matter of urgency.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Northdown Road, Welling, Greater London

item.title: Hole in pavement, 5th December
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Southborough Lane, Southborough, Greater London

item.title: New street light too close to my flat, 5th December
item.description:
Hi, we just found there is a new street light right in front of my flat. it's like Sun in the evening and right shine into my son(5 years old) bedroom. We are really concerned this may affect his eyesight and whole family sleep at night. Also we lost the privacy on the bedroom and winter garden, which you can see clearly from outside. We would like to request moving the street light onto its old location(New Union Square)

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 1, New Union Square, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Westbury Road, Palmers Green, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Rubbish left in street by Recycling lorry, 5th December
item.description:
The Recycling teams threw a bag of waste in the street today. This represents a health hazard and is in the same street as a school Also the street has not been cleaned for months. The build up of leaves is now becoming a serious slip hazard.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Crescent Lane, Clapham, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Sharp lamppost access cover protruding, 5th December
item.description:
The lamppost on Southwark Road just before the bridge cover is sticking out and has sharp corners where I tore my jacket, this could have easily been my arm and could have required stitches or something more serious. I see that this has been damaged since Nov and nothing has been done as yet.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 30, Southwark Street, The Borough, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
